membership: AIPAS is founder member and Operative Secretariat of SME4SPACE (www.sme4space.org), the European panel of Space SME Associations.
goal:
AIPAS is a not for profit Association, aiming at:
- promoting in the various national and international centres the general interests of its Members, by means of suitable contracts with the Private/Public agencies of competence;
- tackling the fundamental problems of the space market also by elaborating, monitoring and observing activities on the field;
- promoting and examining the legislative, administrative, economical and financial provisions that are of interest of its Associates;
- promoting and organising collective participation in industrial and commercial fairs, carrying out the relative actions of press and public relation;
- encouraging companies to work together and form consortia capable of working in programs that they would otherwise be unable to deal with individually;
- promoting actions with the larger enterprises and Public Agencies so that the potentiality and the capability of the SME become adequately valued from a market point of view;
- joining other national and international Associations or Agencies in the interest of its Associates;
- supplying an information service, to interested external Agencies, about general matters related with the space field.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Partecipation to EU Consultation on Space Work Programme, Space Policy and other related consultations through the Italian Space Agency and at European level through SME4SPACE (www.sme4space.org)
